description: '''Chimurenga music''' is a [[Zimbabwe]]an popular music genre coined and popularized by [[Thomas Mapfumo]]. ''[[Chimurenga]]'' is a [[Shona language]] word for liberation, which entered common usage during the [[Rhodesian Bush War]]. The word's modern interpretation has been extended to describe a struggle for human rights, political dignity and [[social justice]]. Mapfumo developed a style of music based on traditional Shona [[mbira]] music, but played with modern electric instrumentation, with lyrics characterized by social and political commentary.
